sorbet.selectedLspConfigId.markdownDescription: The default configuration to use from `sorbet.userLspConfigs` or `sorbet.lspConfigs`.  If unset, defaults to the first item in `sorbet.userLspConfigs` or `sorbet.lspConfigs`.

cwd.description: Current working directory when launching sorbet

command.description: Full command line to invoke sorbet

sorbet.lspConfigs.markdownDescription: Standard Ruby LSP configurations.  If you commit your VSCode settings to source control, you probably want to commit *this* setting, not `sorbet.userLspConfigs`.

default.name: Sorbet (Experimental)
default.description: Experimental Sorbet Ruby IDE features (warning: crashy, for developers only)

sorbet.configFilePatterns.description: List of workspace file patterns that contribute to Sorbet's configuration.  Changes to any of those files should trigger a restart of any actively running Sorbet language server.

sorbet.revealOutputOnError.description: Show the extension output window on errors.

default.name: My Custom Sorbet Configuration
default.description: A longer description of this Sorbet Configuration for use in hover text

cwd.description: Current working directory when launching sorbet

command.description: Full command line to invoke sorbet

sorbet.userLspConfigs.markdownDescription: Custom user LSP configurations that supplement `sorbet.lspConfigs` (and override configurations with the same id).  If you commit your VSCode settings to source control, you probably want to commit `sorbet.lspConfigs`, not this value.
